Lumber's Axe.Info: A regular lumber's axe, normally used to cut wood.

Makeshift Shiv.Info: A makeshift shiv McGuyvered together from a sharp rock, a stick and some twine.

Hunter's Bow.Info: A self-made bow used by an amateur hunter.

Tattered Scroll.Info: Though burnt and barely decipherable, the faintest aura of arcane energy clings to this scroll.

Worldcarver Scythe.Info: The very fabric of reality seems to tear around the blade of this scythe.

Flickering Blade.Info: One moment it's there, the next it's gone. Treasure it while you have it.

Deadeye.Info:
One of the few non-magical Omega weapons out there.
Forged in the cold flames of revenge, this crossbow was made to kill in one shot.

The Necronomicon.Info: Visions of unearthly creatures fill your mind when you hold this book. Be careful with this...

Staff of Galdiea.Info: This staff, treasured and powerful, was once believed to belong to the Goddess Galdiea. You feel blessed while wielding this...

'Nick'.Info: This sword can do a lot of work in one day, but most people don't seem to like it.

Voodoo Glove.Info: Pull the strings of your enemies.

Bear Gloves.Info: Channel your Russian spirit and become the bear.

Lyreaoux Sword.Info:
A rare sword made out of various strong metals. Used by many great travellers over the years.
Some people say the sword holds greater potential than what it seems.

Assassin's Blade.Info: You feel a rush of exhilaration holding this weapon, like you could fall from the sky and come out unscathed.

Gun That Can Kill The Past.Info: What is this, a crossover episode?

Mundane Sword.Info: This sword is completely normal. Still, it does the job well.

Flintlock Pistol.Info: An old pistol, rusted from decades of disrepair and abandonment.

Mana Breaker.Info: A large, clunky sword with edges that seem to ripple around reality.

Leather Carapace.Info: Plain old leather armour. Not constricting, but lacks in physical defense and integrity.

Warrior's Mail.Info: Just the right weight to let you charge into battle while being decently protected.

Rusted Paladin's Armour.Info: Heavy iron plating, marred by decades of rust, weighs down upon your shoulders when you wear this.

Lesser Health Potion.Info: A weak health potion brewed by an amateur alchemist. Heals you for 20HP upon usage.
